response.original_title: 1日10回射精しても止まらないオーガズムSEX
response.overview: Big breasted, lewd beauty Yoshikawa Aimi makes her first appearance in a popular series. "When I have sex, I want to be penetrated all day long..." she loves sex so much that she is banned from sex and masturbation for a month, and when she reaches her limit of endurance, she meets up with a man in a hotel. The moment they enter the room, the man and woman silently devour each other and clash with each other's sexual desires! In bed, on the sofa, in the bath, she repeatedly climaxes and ejaculates like a wild beast, and you can't help but experience this reason-breaking orgasmic sex!
response.tagline: Orgasmic sex that won't stop even if you ejaculate 10 times a day
